original_text: When Moses went out to the special tent, all the people would stand at the doors of their tents. They would watch Moses until he went into the special tent.
korean_text: 모세가 회막으로 나아갈 때에는 백성이 다 일어나 자기 장막 문에 서서 모세가 회막에 들어가기까지 바라보며

sentences.original_text: When Moses went out to the special tent,
all the people would stand at the doors of their tents.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 백성은 자기 장막 문 앞에 서 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: until he went into the special tent.
